issue.title: [Integration] Validate vector type layout in IPC messages
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1362](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1362). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We do not rigorously check in the integration tests whether the vector buffer layout is what we expect it to be in the schema metadata
